body.body: Set up the following fragmentation reaction in a thin-walled 200 μl PCR tube. Mix well by vortex and spin down.

Incubate at 95 °C for 5 min in a pre-heated thermal cycler block with the heated lid closed. Remove tubes from block and immediately add 2 μl of stop solution. Mix well by vortex and spin down, and place on ice.

Purify fragmented RNA using RNA Clean & Concentraton-5 kit, according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Elute in 15 μl molecular biology grade, RNase-free water. Note that each RNA Clean & Concentrator-5 column is suitable for purification of up to 10 μg RNA.

title: **3’ END REPAIR**
body: 4|Set up the following 3’ end repair reaction in a thin-walled 200 μl PCR tube. Mix well by gentle tapping and spin down.

body.body: Purify 3’ end-repaired fragmented RNA using RNA Clean & Concentraton-5 kit, according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Elute in 15 μl molecular biology grade, RNase-free water.

title: **OXIDATION-ELIMINATION-DEPHOSPHORYLATION CYCLES**
body: 7|Set up the following oxidation-elimination reaction in a dark tube. Mix well by vortex and spin down.

body.body: Incubate at 37 °C for 30 minutes with shaking.
Quench the reaction by adding 2 μl of ethylene glycol. Mix well and spin down.

Dephosphorylate by adding 5 μl of CutSmart Buffer \(10X), 2 μl of rSAP enzyme \(2 units) and 1 μl of molecular biology grade, RNase-free water \(total reaction volume of 50 μl), mix well and spin down.
Incubate at 37 °C for 30 minutes with shaking.
Purify RNA using RNA Clean & Concentrator-5 kit, according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Elute in 32 μl molecular biology grade, RNase-free water.
Repeat steps 7-9 once. Make sure not perform dephosphorylation \(steps 10-11).
Purify RNA using RNA Clean & Concentraton-5 kit, according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Elute in 32 μl molecular biology grade, RNase-free water.

title: **5’ PHOSPHORYLATION**
body: 16|Set up the following 5’ dephosphorylation reaction. Mix well by gentle tapping and spin down.

body.body: Purify RNA using RNA Clean & Concentraton-5 kit, according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Elute in 8 μl molecular biology grade, RNase-free water.

Use RNA from step 18 to construct a small RNA library using NEBNext® Small RNA Library Prep Set for Illumina, according to the manufacturer’s instruction, with the exception that 3’ adaptor ligation should be performed  overnight at 16 °C.
